channel.description: Week 3 Announcements This Week 9/4: Lab 1 Due 7 PM 9/9: Module 2 Quizzes 9/11: Discussion 1 9/18: Lab 2 Discussion Sessions Wednesdays 2:30 - 3:30 Office Hours Speaker Invites Sent First Speaker 9/11 Lab 2 Redo Lab 1 using Puppet Reinstall OS, Install Puppet, Make Snapshot Write Puppet Manifest & Test Keep it Simple! Use puppet resource to query Solutions < 200 LOC Growth Mindset Labs are Challenging Read the Linked Documents Ask for Clarification Start Early, Work Methodically Make Snapshots Keep in Touch!
